name: Time Stamp
description: Prints the current time with hour, minute, second, and millisecond. Includes unused text and data inputs for demonstration. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

unused_data.name: unused_data
unused_data.info: This data input is not used in timestamp generation.

code.value:
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MessageInput, DataInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.schema import Data
import datetime

class TimeStampComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Time Stamp"
    description = "Prints the current time with hour, minute, second, and millisecond. Includes unused text and data inputs for demonstration."
    icon = "timer"

    inputs = [
        MessageInput(
            name="unused_text",
            display_name="Unused Text",
            info="This text input is not used in timestamp generation.",
            is_list=True
        ),
        DataInput(
            name="unused_data",
            display_name="Unused Data",
            info="This data input is not used in timestamp generation.",
            is_list=True
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Time Stamp", name="timestamp", method="get_timestamp"),
    ]

    def get_timestamp(self) -> Message:
        # Get the current time
        current_time = datetime.datetime.now()
        
        # Format the time as a string
        time_string = current_time.strftime("%H:%M:%S.%f")[:-3]  # Format up to milliseconds
        
        # Create the full timestamp message
        timestamp_message = f"Current time: {time_string}"
        
        # Set the status and return the message
        self.status = timestamp_message
        return Message(text=timestamp_message)

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MessageInput, DataInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from axiestudio.schema import Data
import datetime

class TimeStampComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Time Stamp"
    description = "Prints the current time with hour, minute, second, and millisecond. Includes unused text and data inputs for demonstration."
    icon = "timer"

    inputs = [
        MessageInput(
            name="unused_text",
            display_name="Unused Text",
            info="This text input is not used in timestamp generation.",
            is_list=True
        ),
        DataInput(
            name="unused_data",
            display_name="Unused Data",
            info="This data input is not used in timestamp generation.",
            is_list=True
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Time Stamp", name="timestamp", method="get_timestamp"),
    ]

    def get_timestamp(self) -> Message:
        # Get the current time
        current_time = datetime.datetime.now()
        
        # Format the time as a string
        time_string = current_time.strftime("%H:%M:%S.%f")[:-3]  # Format up to milliseconds
        
        # Create the full timestamp message
        timestamp_message = f"Current time: {time_string}"
        
        # Set the status and return the message
        self.status = timestamp_message
        return Message(text=timestamp_message)
